Yes but it is 4mpd still got net gain
People view 1 miles to be 1.5 cents usually. So 4mpd card is 5 percent cashback roughly. So after 3.25 fcy still get 1.75 net gain

No. Contactless  Petrol or FCY. 3 different categoriesRead this:https://milelion.com/2023/05/04/review-uob-visa-signature-card/
